data.title: pyhrs: Spectroscopic data reduction package for SALT
data.name: pyhrs
data.description: Software for reducing observations from the SALT High Resolution Spectrograph

evidence: "Package for reducing data from the High Resolution Spectrograph on the Southern African Large Telescope."

"Fora  quick start and use of the scripts, see the `Basic Usage instructions <https://github.com/saltastro/pyhrs/wiki/Basic-Usage-Instructions>`_" (indicates users run scripts directly, i.e., application-style use)
README is presented as a GitHub project with usage docs and CI badges, but no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository.
